00002

00009 /** Public FFT Patcher struct.
00010     @ingroup pfft
00011 */
00012 typedef struct _pfftpub {
00013     t_pxobject          x_obj;
00014     t_object            *x_parent;      ///< parent patcher
00015     t_object            *x_patcher;     ///< patcher loaded
00016     struct _dspchain    *x_chain;       ///< dsp chain within pfft
00017     long                x_fftsize;      ///< fft frame size
00018     long                x_ffthop;       ///< hop between  fft frames
00019     long                x_fftoffset;    ///< n samples offset before fft is started
00020     long                x_fftindex;     ///< current index into fft frame 
00021     short               x_fullspect;    ///< process half-spectrum (0) or full mirrored spectrum (1)?
00022 } t_pfftpub;
00023
